author: Choo Han Teck J:
counsel: Lee Lit Cheng (Deputy Public Prosecutor) for the Public Prosecutor; Spencer Gwee (Spencer Gwee & Co) and Kertar Singh (Kertar & Co) for the respondent/applicant
tags-parsed: Courts and Jurisdiction/High court/Whether court having jurisdiction to make restraint orders prior to conviction/Whether sufficient grounds existing to discharge such orders/Sections 15(2)(a), 16 Corruption, Drug Trafficking and Other Serious Crimes (Confiscation of Benefits) Act (Cap 65A, 2000 Rev Ed)
